![Logo](/logo1.png?raw=true) # Lambda Express Landing

The landing page for the Lambda Express team :)

[üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Lambda Express](/lambda_optimized.webp?raw=true)
## Design Click [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Z1WRcmXUHNp00NRRJ1nBkz/Lambda-Express?node-id=30%3A5&t=xv1YlWnsmdj6Jeqq-1) to look at the design made on Figma. ## Technologies - [Turbo](https://turbo.build/): A tool to create and manage monorepos. - It helps a lot when it comes to configuration. If you take a look at the `packages` folder, you will notice that `tsconfig` and `eslint-config-custom` are packages that are shared between apps. - [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/): A react framework that supports SSR. - [Husky](https://www.npmjs.com/package/husky): To improve commits. ## To start - Minimum requirements: - node v18.13.0 - yarn 1.22.19 - `yarn install` - `yarn build`

Si echa un vistazo a la carpeta de paquetes, notar√° que `tsconfig` y `eslint-config-custom` son paquetes compartidos entre aplicaciones. - [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/): Un framework de React que admite SSR. - [Husky](https://www.npmjs.com/package/husky): Para mejorar los commits. ## Para comenzar - Requerimientos m√≠nimos: - node v18.13.0 - yarn 1.22.19 - `yarn install` - `yarn build`

# Tattoo-Studio
A `Tattoo-Studio` portfolio with Cloudinary Image Gallery, On-Demand ISR, SSG, Static Paths ![Banner](/public/Banner.png?raw=true) [Features](#features)   ‚Ä¢    [Installation](#installation)   ‚Ä¢    [Usage](#usage)   ‚Ä¢    [Environment Variables](#environment-variables) [üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Home](/public/Home.gif) ![Portfolio](/public/Portfolio.gif) ![Contact](/public/Contact.gif)
## Features - Image Gallery connected with _cloudinary_ Account - Automatic e-mails with _nodemailer_ - Form Validation with _react-hook-form_ - Internationalization with _GetStaticProps_ - Beautiful UI with _material-ui_ - Beautiful Page Animations with _framer-motion_ - Responsive 8-pt grid system with _figma_ - Sitemap with _next-sitemap_ - SEO with _next-seo_ ## Installation ```sh # Clone this repository $ git clone git@github.com:florescente/tattoo.git # Go into the repository $ cd vitor-underground-tattoo # Install dependencies $ npm install OR $ yarn set version berry $ yarn install $ yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode # Run the app $ npm run dev OR $ yarn dev ``` ## Usage 1. Create a Cloudinary Account 2. Create a Gmail Account 3. Get Cloudinary Config Info 4. Generate Gmail App password 5. Create Folders with Images in Cloudinary 6. Set the environment variables 7. run ## Environment Variables ```bash NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_NAME NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL CLOUDINARY_NAME CLOUDINARY_API_KEY CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET EMAIL - GMAIL PASSWORD - Generate APP password SECRET_TOKEN ``` ## Cloudinary Configurations This is important for the ISR revalidation: Go to the cloudinary settings, under uploads tab, and put this in notifications: ```bash https:///api/revalidate?secret= ``` ## Meta Created By Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)

# Estudio de Tatuajes
Un `Estudio-de-Tatuajes` con Galer√≠a de im√°genes usando Cloudinary, Bajo Demanda ISR, SSG, Caminos Est√°ticos ![Banner](/public/Banner.png?raw=true) [Tecnolog√≠as](#tecnolog√≠as)   ‚Ä¢    [Instalaci√≥n](#instalaci√≥n)   ‚Ä¢    [C√≥mo Utilizar](#c√≥mo-utilizar)   ‚Ä¢    [Variables de Entorno](#variables-de-entorno) [üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Home](/public/Home.gif) ![Portfolio](/public/Portfolio.gif) ![Contact](/public/Contact.gif)
## Tecnolog√≠as - Galer√≠a de im√°genes conectada con _cloudinary_ Account - Emails autom√°ticos con _nodemailer_ - Validaci√≥n de formulario con _react-hook-form_ - Internacionalizaci√≥n con _GetStaticProps_ - Hermosa Interfaz de Usuario con _material-ui_ - Hermosas Animaciones de P√°gina con _framer-motion_ - Cuadr√≠cula de 8 puntos Responsivo con _figma_ - Sitemap con _next-sitemap_ - SEO con _next-seo_ ## Instalaci√≥n ```sh # Clonar este repositorio $ git clone git@github.com:florescente/tattoo.git # Ingrese a la carpeta $ cd vitor-underground-tattoo # Instalar dependencias $ npm install O $ yarn set version berry $ yarn install $ yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode # Ejecute la aplicaci√≥n $ npm run dev O $ yarn dev ``` ## C√≥mo utilizar 1. Crea una cuenta en Cloudinary 2. Crea una cuenta de Gmail 3. Obtener informaci√≥n de configuraci√≥n de Cloudinary 4. Generar una contrase√±a de APP en Gmail 5. Crear carpetas con im√°genes en Cloudinary 6. Crear las variables de entorno 7. Ejecute la aplicaci√≥n ## Variables de Entorno ```bash NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_NAME NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL CLOUDINARY_NAME CLOUDINARY_API_KEY CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET EMAIL - GMAIL PASSWORD - Generar contrase√±a de APP SECRET_TOKEN ``` ## Configuraciones de Cloudinary Esto es importante para la revalidaci√≥n del ISR: Vaya a la configuraci√≥n de Cloudinary, en la pesta√±a de uploads, y ponga esto en notifications: ```bash https:///api/revalidate?secret= ``` ## Meta Creado Por Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)

# Est√∫dio de Tatuagem
Um `Est√∫dio-de-Tatuagem` com Galeria de Imagem usando Cloudinary, ISR Sob Demanda, SSG, Caminhos Est√°ticos ![Banner](/public/Banner.png?raw=true) [Tecnologias](#tecnologias)   ‚Ä¢    [Instala√ß√£o](#instala√ß√£o)   ‚Ä¢    [Como Usar](#como-usar)   ‚Ä¢    [Vari√°veis de Ambiente](#vari√°veis-de-ambiente) [üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Home](/public/Home.gif) ![Portfolio](/public/Portfolio.gif) ![Contact](/public/Contact.gif)
## Tecnologias - Galeria de Imagem conectada com _cloudinary_ Account - Emails autom√°ticos com _nodemailer_ - Valida√ß√£o de Formul√°rio com _react-hook-form_ - Internacionaliza√ß√£o com _GetStaticProps_ - Lindas Interfaces de Usu√°rio com _material-ui_ - Bel√≠ssimas Anima√ß√µes de P√°gina com _framer-motion_ - Grid de 8 pontos Responsivo com _figma_ - Sitemap com _next-sitemap_ - SEO com _next-seo_ ## Instala√ß√£o ```sh # Clone esse reposit√≥rio $ git clone git@github.com:florescente/tattoo.git # Entre na pasta $ cd vitor-underground-tattoo # Instale depend√™ncias $ npm install OU $ yarn set version berry $ yarn install $ yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode # Rode o app $ npm run dev OU $ yarn dev ``` ## Como Usar 1. Crie uma conta no Cloudinary 2. Crie uma conta no Gmail 3. Pegue as informa√ß√µes de configura√ß√£o do Cloudinary 4. Gere uma senha de app no Gmail 5. Crie pastas com imagens no Cloudinary 6. Crie as vari√°veis de ambiente 7. Rode ## Vari√°veis de Ambiente ```bash NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_NAME NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL CLOUDINARY_NAME CLOUDINARY_API_KEY CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET EMAIL - GMAIL PASSWORD - Gerar senha de APP SECRET_TOKEN ``` ## Congifura√ß√µes do Cloudinary Isso √© importante para a revalida√ß√£o de ISR: V√° para as configura√ß√µes do cloudinary, debaixo da aba uploads, e coloque isso em notifications: ```bash https:///api/revalidate?secret= ``` ## Meta Criado Por Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)

# Tattoo Portfolio
A `tattoo-artist` personal portfolio with Unsplash Gallery, Blurhash Images and SSG. ![Banner](/public/banner.png?raw=true) [Features](#features)   ‚Ä¢    [Installation](#installation)   ‚Ä¢    [Usage](#usage)   ‚Ä¢    [Environment Variables](#environment-variables) [üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Home](/public/page.gif) ![Portfolio](/public/portfolio.gif) ![Contact](/public/contact.gif)
## Features - Image Gallery connected with _unsplash_ - Lazy loading images with _blurhash_ - Automatic e-mails with _nodemailer_ - Form Validation with _react-hook-form_ - Beautiful UI and dark-mode with _chakra-ui_ - Beautiful Page Animations with _framer-motion_ - Responsive UI - Static Generated Pages with _nextjs_ - Sitemap with _next-sitemap_ - SEO with _next-seo_ ## Installation ```sh # Clone this repository $ git@github.com:florescente/underground.git # Go into the repository $ cd underground # Install dependencies $ npm install OR $ yarn set version berry $ yarn install $ yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode # Run the app $ npm run dev OR $ yarn dev ``` ## Usage 1. Create an Unsplash Account 2. Create a Gmail Account 3. Get Unsplash Config Info 4. Generate Gmail App password 5. Configure URL in trampos.tsx static props 6. Set the environment variables 7. run ## Environment variables ```bash NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KEY_UNSPLASH - Unsplash API LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/var/task/node_modules/canvas/build/Release - Canvas Bug EMAIL - GMAIL PASSWORD - Generate App Password ``` ## Meta Created By Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)

# Portafolio de Tatuajes
Un portafolio personal de "artista-tatuador" con Unsplash Galeria, Imagens com Blurhash y SSG. ![Banner](/public/banner.png?raw=true) [Tecnolog√≠as](#tecnolog√≠as)   ‚Ä¢    [Instalaci√≥n](#instalaci√≥n)   ‚Ä¢    [C√≥mo utilizar](#c√≥mo-utilizar)   ‚Ä¢    [Variables de Entorno](#variables-de-entorno) [üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Home](/public/page.gif) ![Portfolio](/public/portfolio.gif) ![Contact](/public/contact.gif)
## Tecnolog√≠as - Galer√≠a de im√°genes conectada con _unsplash_ - Carga diferida de im√°genes con _blurhash_ - Emails autom√°ticos con _nodemailer_ - Validaci√≥n de formulario con _react-hook-form_ - Hermosa Interfaz de Usuario y Modo Nocturno con _chakra-ui_ - Hermosas Animaciones de P√°gina con _framer-motion_ - Design Responsivo - P√°ginas generadas est√°ticamente con _nextjs_ - Sitemap con _next-sitemap_ - SEO con _next-seo_ ## Instalaci√≥n ```sh # Clonar este repositorio $ git@github.com:florescente/underground.git # Ingrese a la carpeta $ cd underground # Instalar dependencias $ npm install O $ yarn set version berry $ yarn install $ yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode # Ejecute la aplicaci√≥n $ npm run dev O $ yarn dev ``` ## C√≥mo utilizar 1. Crea una cuenta en Unsplash 2. Crea una cuenta de Gmail 3. Obtener informaci√≥n de configuraci√≥n de Unsplash 4. Generar una contrase√±a de APP en Gmail 5. Configurar la URL en static props trampos.tsx 6. Crear las variables de entorno 7. Ejecute la aplicaci√≥n ## Variables de Entorno ```bash NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KEY_UNSPLASH - Unsplash API LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/var/task/node_modules/canvas/build/Release - Canvas Bug EMAIL - GMAIL PASSWORD - Generar contrase√±a de APP ``` ## Meta Creado Por Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)

# Portf√≥lio de Tatuagens
Um portfolio pessoal de `artista-tatuador` com Unsplash Galeria, Imagens em Blurhash e SSG. ![Banner](/public/banner.png?raw=true) [Tecnologias](#tecnologias)   ‚Ä¢    [Instala√ß√£o](#instala√ß√£o)   ‚Ä¢    [Como Usar](#como-usar)   ‚Ä¢    [Vari√°veis de Ambiente](#vari√°veis-de-ambiente) [üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md) ![Home](/public/page.gif) ![Portfolio](/public/portfolio.gif) ![Contact](/public/contact.gif)
## Tecnologias - Galeria de Imagem conectada com _unsplash_ - Carregamento pregui√ßoso de imagens com _blurhash_ - Emails autom√°ticos com _nodemailer_ - Valida√ß√£o de Formul√°rio com _react-hook-form_ - Lindas UI e Modo Noite com _chakra-ui_ - Bel√≠ssimas Anima√ß√µes de P√°gina com _framer-motion_ - Design Responsivo - P√°ginas Geradas Estaticamente com _nextjs_ - Sitemap com _next-sitemap_ - SEO com _next-seo_ ## Instala√ß√£o ```sh # Clone esse reposit√≥rio $ git@github.com:florescente/underground.git # Entre na pasta $ cd underground # Instale depend√™ncias $ npm install OU $ yarn set version berry $ yarn install $ yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode # Rode o App $ npm run dev OU $ yarn dev ``` ## Como Usar 1. Crie uma conta no Unsplash 2. Crie uma conta no Gmail 3. Pegue as informa√ß√µes de configura√ß√£o do Unsplash 4. Gere uma senha de app no Gmail 5. Configure a URL em trampos.tsx static props 6. Crie as vari√°veis de ambiente 7. Rode ## Vari√°veis de Ambiente ```bash NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KEY_UNSPLASH - Unsplash API LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/var/task/node_modules/canvas/build/Release - Canvas Bug EMAIL - GMAIL PASSWORD - Gerar senha de APP ``` ## Meta Criado Por Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)

# My Personal Portfolio

My `personal portfolio + blog` with svelte, github graphql api and markdown

[üá¨üáß English](/README.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üá™üá∏ Espa√±ol](/README.es.md)   ‚Ä¢    [üáßüá∑ Portugu√™s](/README.pt-BR.md)
## Features - Beautiful UI with _tailwind_ - Dark mode + 3 themes with _skeleton_ - Email service with _formspree_ - Markdown support with _mdsvex_ - Form Validation with _zod_ - Static Generated Pages with _sveltekit_ - Internationalization with _typesafe-i18n_ - Sitemap with _svelte-sitemap_ ## Meta Created By Sarassaura: [github.com/sarassaura](https://github.com/sarassaura)
